pages.text: The $(5)Disintegration Module$() can be used in a $(l:mffs:machines/projector)Force Field Projector$() to alter the effect a force field has on its surroundings. Placing a $(5)Disintegration Module$() into a Projector's matrix slots will cause the field it generates to break any blocks that are obstructing it. Broken blocks are dropped as items and can be picked up.

pages.title: Usage
pages.text: The $(5)Disintegration Module$() is compatible with all projector modes and can be used to reverse the effect of the $(l:mffs:projector_modules/stabilization_module)$(5)Field Stabilizer Module$(). Adding $(l:mffs:upgrade_modules/speed_module)$(5)Speed Module$()s into a Projector allows multiple blocks to be disintegrated at once. It can also be combined with a $(l:mffs:projector_modules/collection_module)$(5)Collection Module$() to automatically pick up broken blocks.
